taskDescription: Siobhan and Tristan are trying to decide where they will have dinner. Siobhan wants to go to Antoineâ€™s, Burger Hut, or the Chowder Palace. Tristan prefers Burger Hut, Chowder Palace, or Duck Duck Taco. They will flip a coin to decide who gets to choose, then that person selects a restaurant from their list. Use an appropriate method to identify the sample space of possible outcomes, which include the person who chooses and the restaurant.
